abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The winners of the A/X Pairs on Dec. 26 at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan were Dana Berkowitz and Chris Willenken of New York City.

headline.main: A/X Pairs at Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional
headline.seo: Bridge - A/X Pairs at Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional
